text: Scheggia may refer to: * Scheggia e Pascelupo, a comune (municipality) in the Province of Perugia in the Italian region Umbria. * Scheggia Pass, a pass in the Italian region Umbria that divides the Northern and Central Apennines. * Giovanni di ser Giovanni Guidi known as Scheggia (b. 1406, San Giovanni Valdarno, d. 1486, Firenze)
title: Scheggia
